564:1: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-duradhimocā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena kuśalamūlavirahitena pāpamitrahastagatena|
564:3: duradhimocā subhūte prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena parīttakuśalamūlena durmedhasā anarthikena alpaśrutena hīnaprajñena pāpamitropastabdhena aśuśrūṣaṇāparipṛcchakajātīyena kuśaleṣu dharmeṣvanabhiyuktena||
564:36: paramaduradhimocā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena anavaropitakuśalamūlena pāpamitrahastagatena māravaśagatena kusīdena hīnavīryeṇa muṣitasmṛtinā duṣprajñena|
564:39: paramaduradhimocā subhūte prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena anavaropitakuśalamūlena pāpamitrahastagatena māravaśagatena kusīdena hīnavīryeṇa muṣitasmṛtinā duṣprajñena|
564:46: iti hi subhūte phalaviśuddhito rūpaviśuddhī rupaviśuddhitaḥ phalaviśuddhiḥ|
564:52: iti hi subhūte phalaviśuddhito vijñānaviśuddhirvijñānaviśuddhitaḥ phalaviśuddhiḥ|
564:53: punaraparaṃ subhūte yā rūpaviśuddhiḥ sā sarvajñatāviśuddhiḥ,
564:64: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā|
564:80: āha-na jānāti na saṃjānīte bhagavan prajñāpāramitā|
564:82: āha-kiṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā na jānāti na saṃjānīte?
564:83: bhagavānāha-rūpaṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitā na jānāti na saṃjānīte|
564:87: vijñānaṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitā na jānāti na saṃjānīte|
564:111: āha-ya evamasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhagavan avabodhaḥ,
564:114: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha-sā khalu punariyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā nāpare tīre,
564:118: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha-evamapi bhagavan saṃjñāsyate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo riñciṣyatīmāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dūrīkariṣyatīmāṃ prajñāpāramitām|
564:122: nāmato'pi hi subhūto saṅgo nimittato'pi saṅgaḥ|
564:123: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā svākhyātā sunirdiṣṭā supariniṣṭhitā,
564:126: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-katame te āyuṣman subhūte saṅgāḥ?
564:130: atīteṣu dharmeṣvatītā dharmā iti saṃjānīte, saṅgaḥ|
564:131: anāgateṣu dharmeṣvanāgatā dharmā iti saṃjānīte, saṅgaḥ|
564:132: pratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣu pratyutpannā dharmā iti saṃjānīte, saṅgaḥ|
564:133: iyantaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasūyate bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalaḥ prathamena cittotpādeneti saṃjānīte, saṅgaḥ||
564:134: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-katamena ārya subhūte paryāyeṇa saṅgaḥ?
564:137: na ca cittaprakṛtiḥ śakyā pariṇāmayituṃ tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā mahāyānasaṃprasthitena|
564:138: tasmāttarhi kauśika paraṃ saṃdarśayatā samādāpayatā samuttejayatā saṃpraharṣayatā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bhūtānugamena saṃdarśayitavyaṃ samādāpayitavyaṃ samuttejayitavyaṃ saṃpraharṣayitavyam|
564:140: buddhānujñātayā ca samādāpanayā paraṃ samādāpayati sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā|
564:142: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt-sādhu sādhu subhūte,
564:144: tena hi subhūte anyānapi sūkṣmatarān saṅgānākhyāsyāmi,
564:146: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru|
564:149: bhagavānetadavocat-iha subhūte śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ nimittato manasi karoti|
564:154: iti hi so'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ ye anāsravā dharmāstānanumode ityanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmīti pariṇāmayati|
564:155: yā khalu punaḥ subhūte dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā,
564:156: na sā atītā vā anāgatā vā pratyutpannā vā|
564:160: na sā śakyā pariṇāmayituṃ na nimittīkartuṃ nārambaṇīkartum|
564:173: tathā hi subhūte akṛtāḥ sarvadharmāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenābhisaṃbuddhāḥ|
564:175: bhagavānāha-tathāhi subhūte prakṛtyaiva na te dharmāḥ kiṃcit|
564:188: evametāḥ subhūte sarvāḥ saṅgakoṭyo vivarjitā bhavanti||
564:194: bhagavānāha-tathā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā na cittena jñātavyā na cittagamanīyā|
564:197: āha-tena hi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kathaṃ caritavyam?
564:198: bhagavānāha-sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranna rūpe carati,
564:200: evaṃ sacenna vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu|
564:224: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadyadevaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sasaṅgatā ca asaṅgatā ca khyātāḥ|
564:232: evaṃ yāvanmanaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā sasaṅgāsaṅgeti na carati,
564:245: evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā dharmā balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sasaṅgāsaṅgā iti na carati,
564:257: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe saṅgaṃ janayati,
564:258: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu|
564:265: na śīlapāramitāyāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṅgaṃ janayati,
564:272: na sakṛdāgāmiphale na anāgāmiphale na arhattve saṅgaṃ janayati,
564:277: asaktā abaddhā amuktā asamatikrāntā hi subhūte sarvajñatā|
564:278: evaṃ hi subhūte sarvasaṅgasamatikramāya bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam||
564:289: rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhannākāśasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeta,
564:301: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha-duṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan na saṃsīdati notplavate|
564:308: ākāśena sārdhaṃ sa bhagavan saṃnaddhukāmo yaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ badhnāti|
564:310: śūro bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya ākāśasamānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadhātusamānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnaddhukāmo'
564:314: mahāvīryapāramitāsaṃnāhaprāptaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya ākāśasamānāṃ dharmadhātusamānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyate||
564:315: atha khalvanyatamo bhikṣuryena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat-namaskaromi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyai|
564:316: tathā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati,
564:318: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-ya ārya subhūte atra prajñāpāramitāyāmeva yogamāpatsyate,
564:324: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat-ājñāpayatu bhagavān|
564:325: tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ karomi ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dhārayati|
564:326: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat-samanupaśyasi tvaṃ kauśika taṃ dharmaṃ yasya dharmasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kariṣyasi?
564:328: subhūtirāha-evaṃ kauśika sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthāsyati,
564:333: api ca kauśika ākāśasya sa rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta,
564:334: yo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ|
564:335: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika pratibalastvaṃ pratiśrutkāyā rakṣāvaraṇagupti saṃvidhātum?
564:337: subhūtirāha-evameva kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran viharan pratiśrutkopamāḥ sarvadharmā iti parijānāti|
564:341: te ca dharmā na vidyante na saṃdṛśyante na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante iti viharati|
564:344: atha khalu buddhānubhāvena ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau catvāro mahārājānaḥ,
564:349: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte'tiṣṭhan|
564:353: sahāpatiśca mahābrahmā buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena buddhasahasraṃ samānvāharanti sma|
564:354: ebhireva nāmabhirebhireva padairebhirevākṣaraiḥ subhūtināmadheyaireva bhikṣubhiriyameva prajñāpāramitopadiṣṭā,
564:356: tatrāpi śakrā eva devendrāḥ paripṛcchanti sma,
564:357: paripraśnayanti sma-asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe iyameva prajñāpāramitā bhāṣitā|
564:359: nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe enāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyate iti||
